Reviews.Title: Buen Bichin
Reviews.Author: Melquisedec
Reviews.Content: Excelente. Lo traje a Venezuela y funciona calidad, es un poco parecido al 9360, este es mas sencillo claramente, sin embargo con el sistema BB7 correo muy bien. Lo recomiendo

Reviews.Title: 3G
Reviews.Author: Denny Fernandez
Reviews.Content: Do I need to know if this blackberry 9320 works with the bandas 1,4,8? I need the band 8 that for that my operator works to 900 MHz, this as for 3G, thank you.BLACKBERRY 9320 UNLOCKED FACTORY (oem) NO WARRANTY

Reviews.Title: Great purchase - Go BBery!
Reviews.Author: David Cordero
Reviews.Content: I had a Blackberry 8820 for a number of years and it was a great phone.  But I needed to move up and still keep all my contacts and notes.This phone is a great upgrade.Above average cameraFast, slim and very good on battery - if you do not turn on all the bells and whistles.  And yes, this phone has quite a few.Did not come with a case, but still a good value.

Reviews.Title: compra de alexander
Reviews.Author: alexander valera
Reviews.Content: este producto es de muy buena calidad, el envio fue rapido me contactaron rapidamente y no tuve ningun inconveniente el momento de la entraga, se los recomiendo

Reviews.Title: william castro
Reviews.Author: william
Reviews.Content: este fue un regalo para mi hijo y esta muy contento porque es el teléfono que el querías, es muy buen telefono

Reviews.Title: not buy this phone
Reviews.Author: david lopez
Reviews.Content: Blackberry Curve 9320 Black Keyboard WiFi Quadband Unlocked Cell Phone Quadband is not up to my operator 3g, the phone is hurting me at 3 months, was restarted at any time. bad

Reviews.Title: Not NEW Blackberry!  (from Global Distributors - fulfilled by Amazon).
Reviews.Author: W.  C.
Reviews.Content: I ordered a NEW Blackberry Curve 9320 Gsm Unlocked.  What I got was a factory-refurbished Blackberry 9320 with scratches and a dent. Also, looking in the back, it appears used since there was residue on the inside under the battery.  I don't know if it was unlocked since I did not use it and returned it immediately since it was not as advertised.I am currently awaiting a refund (less shipping) and will follow-up afterwards.
